Description: Two broken beads: both globular, the smaller in translucent sapphire-blue, the larger in opaque blue-green glass. Originally found with five others, presumably from the same necklace. Blue bead kept in same box as EA68467.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: The smaller blue bead is a fragment of a bead in the string of beads with Registration Number 1894,0816.277, EA68467.
